column1: # TODO +back can be a useful feature for fine-grained consonantal place distinctions
place   alveolar    [+ant,+cor,-distr]   # TODO +strid for fricatives and affricates
place   labio-palatal   [+cor,-ant,+distr,+hi,+dorsal]  # TODO does labio-... equal +round or +lab?
place   labio-dental        # TODO +strid for fricatives and affricates
place   palatal [+cor,-ant,+distr,+hi,+dorsal]  # TODO maybe palatal sounds should rather be -hi (opposed to palatal-velar)?
place   post-alveolar   [+cor,-ant,+distr]   # TODO +strid for fricatives and affricates
place   retroflex   [+cor,-ant,=distr,+hi]   # TODO does Zsiga say anything about retroflexes? => no, check hall & discuss w Kellen
place   uvular  [+strid,+dorsal,+lo]    # TODO +strid for fricatives and affricates
palatalization  labio-palatalized   [+round,+hi,+dorsal]    # TODO is the same as labialized...
duration    mid-long    [+long] # TODO or maybe not?
manner  approximant [-cons,+cont,+son]  # TODO -cons only if not lateral
